title: Almagest (in the recension of Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Ṭūsī)
author: Ptolemy
description: The greatest influence on the development of Arabic astronomy was the Almagest of Ptolemy (2nd century).  The Almagest was translated several times into Arabic in the 9th century, and in the ensuing centuries attracted countless commentaries &c.
